#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int pipes[10004];
int main()
{
    int cases;
    scanf("%d",&cases);
    while(cases--)
    {
        int num,i,flag=-1;
        long long sum = 0;
        scanf("%d",&num);
        for(i=0; i<num; i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&pipes[i]);
            sum += pipes[i];
        }
        sort(pipes,pipes+num);
        for(i=num-1; i>1; i--)
        {
            if(sum-pipes[i] > pipes[i])
            {
                flag = i+1;
                break;
            }
            sum -= pipes[i];
        }
        printf("%d\n",flag);
    }
    return 0;
}
